arts.ttl: Kovac hails "great team performance" after Lille win
arts.sum: Niko Kovac lauded a "great team performance" after Borussia Dortmund secured a spot in the Champions League quarter-finals with a win over Lille.

arts.ttl: Guirassy's rise from journeyman to Champions League marksman
arts.sum: From injury-hit journeyman to Champions League goal machine - BBC Sport charts the rise of Borussia Dortmund striker Serhou Guirassy.

arts.ttl: 2025 Champions League quarter-finals: matchups, bracket and dates of the matches
arts.sum: On Tuesday, the first four quarter-final spots were snapped up by Barcelona, Bayern Munich, Inter Milan and Paris Saint-Germain, with the Frenchmen delivering the night’s most notable performance by knocking out six-time European Cup winners Liverpool. The final quarter-final berth will be filled by either Atlético Madrid or Real Madrid, whose round-of-16 second leg has headed into extra time.

arts.ttl: Goalkeeper howler gifts Lille early lead against Dortmund
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund goalkeeper Gregor Kobel lets the ball in through his legs from a shot by Lille forward Jonathan David in the second leg of their Champions League last-16 tie.

arts.ttl: MOTM Poll: Borussia Dortmund Come from Behind to Beat Lille in the Champions League
arts.sum: BVB got off to a terrible start, but they turned it round to win and progress to a quarter-final matchup against Barcelona. For much of the game, Beier was quiet, but he burst to life in the second half, and his efforts were rewarded with an excellent winning goal.

arts.ttl: Barcelona to face Dortmund in UCL quarter-finals
arts.sum: Barcelona will take on Borussia Dortmund in the quarter-finals of the Champions League after the German side saw off Lille in the last 16. After a 1-1 draw in the first leg, Dortmund ran out 2-1 winners in the return in France to complete a 3-2 aggregate victory.

arts.ttl: Lille 1-2 Borussia Dortmund: Highlights, man of the match, stats as BVB set up Barcelona Champions League clash with comeback
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund faced Lille in the second leg of their Champions League round of 16 tie on Wednesday evening with Jonathan David, Emre Can and Max Beier on target.

arts.ttl: Brilliant Beier blasts Borussia Dortmund into quarter-final berth
arts.sum: BVB made the trip to Lille this evening for the second-leg of their UEFA Champions League last-16 tie which ended in a 2-1 win for Niko Kovac's side.

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Lille 1-2 Borussia Dortmund (Agg: 2-3): Maximilian Beier BVB’s hero
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund secured their place in the UEFA Champions League Quarter-Final with a 3-2 aggregate win over Lille. Going behind after a calamitous Gregor Kobel error that allowed Jonathan David…

arts.ttl: Guirassy's rise from journeyman to Champions League marksman
arts.sum: From injury-hit journeyman to Champions League goal machine - BBC Sport charts the rise of Borussia Dortmund striker Serhou Guirassy.
